sourcesContent:
<template>
  <!-- ///////// -->
    <t-space direction="vertical" size="large">
    <!-- <t-radio-group v-model="formData.labelAlign" variant="default-filled">
      <t-radio-button value="left">左对齐</t-radio-button>
      <t-radio-button value="right">右对齐</t-radio-button>
      <t-radio-button value="top">顶部对齐</t-radio-button>
    </t-radio-group> -->

    <t-form :data="formData" :label-align="formData.labelAlign" :label-width="60">
      <t-form-item label="订单号" name="oid" style="display: flex; align-items: center;">
        <t-input v-model="formData.oid" style="flex-grow: 1; margin-right: 10px;"></t-input>
        <t-button theme="primary" type="submit">查询</t-button>
      </t-form-item>
      
    </t-form>
  </t-space>

<!-- ////////// -->
  <t-space direction="vertical">
    <!-- 按钮操作区域 -->
    <t-radio-group v-model="size" variant="default-filled">
      <!-- <t-radio-button value="small">小尺寸</t-radio-button> -->
      <t-radio-button value="medium">订单列表</t-radio-button>
      <!-- <t-radio-button value="large">大尺寸</t-radio-button> -->
    </t-radio-group>

    <!-- 当数据为空需要占位时，会显示 cellEmptyContent -->
    <t-table
      row-key="index"
      :data="data"
      :columns="columns"
      :stripe="stripe"
      :bordered="bordered"
      :hover="hover"
      :table-layout="tableLayout ? 'auto' : 'fixed'"
      :size="size"
      :pagination="pagination"
      :show-header="showHeader"
      cell-empty-content="-"
      resizable
      lazy-load
      @row-click="handleRowClick"
    >
    </t-table>
  </t-space>
</template>

<script setup lang="jsx">
///////
import { reactive } from 'vue';

const formData = reactive({
  labelAlign: 'right',
  name: '',
  password: '',
});

////////
import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue';
import axios from 'axios';

// 定义响应式数据变量
const data = ref([]);
const total = ref(0);

// 定义表格的样式及状态控制变量
const stripe = ref(true);
const bordered = ref(true);
const hover = ref(false);
const tableLayout = ref(false);
const size = ref('medium');
const showHeader = ref(true);

// 定义表格列配置
const columns = ref([
  { colKey: 'oid', title: '订单号', width: '100' },
  { colKey: 'order_time', title: '下单时间', width: '150' },
  { colKey: 'cid', title: '顾客号', width: '100' },
  { colKey:'status', title: '订单状态', width: '100' },
  // { colKey:'detail', title: '订单详细', width: '100' },
  { colKey:'total_price', title: '订单总价', width: '100' },
  // { colKey:'confirm', title: '确认订单', width: '100' },
]);

// 定义行点击事件处理函数
const handleRowClick = (e) => {
  console.log(e);
};

// 定义分页配置
const pagination = {
  defaultCurrent: 1,
  defaultPageSize: 5,
  total:total.value,
};

// 请求后端数据并写入表中
const fetchData = async () => {
  try {
    console.log('开始请求数据...');
    const response = await axios.get('/api/orders'); // 根据实际API端点替换
    // const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:8080/orders');
    console.log('请求数据成功:', response.data);
    // console.log('请求数据总数:', response.data.length);
    data.value = response.data;
    total.value = response.data.length;
    pagination.total = total.value;
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('请求数据失败:', error);
  }
};

onMounted(() => {
  fetchData();
});
</script>

<style scoped>
/* 样式范围限定在当前组件 */
</style>
